Package com.inkronsane.ReadArticlesServer.controller

Class ArticleController

java.lang.Object
com.inkronsane.ReadArticlesServer.controller.ArticleController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/article") @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000") public class ArticleController extends Object
Controller for managing articles. Author: Hybalo Oleksandr Date: 2024-05-13

  • Method Details

    • getAllArticles

      @GetMapping("/getAll") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ArticlePayload> getAllArticles(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page)
      Retrieves all articles.
      Parameters:
      page - Page number for pagination (default is 0).
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with ArticlePayload containing the articles.

    • getArticleById

      @GetMapping("/a/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ArticlePayload> getArticleById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves a specific article by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the article to retrieve.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with ArticlePayload containing the requested article.

    • searchArticles

      @GetMapping("/search") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ArticlePayload> searchArticles(ArticleSearch articleSearch, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page)
      Searches articles based on the provided search criteria.
      Parameters:
      articleSearch - The search criteria.
      page - Page number for pagination (default is 0).
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with ArticlePayload containing the search results.

    • createArticle

      @PostMapping("/create") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ArticlePayload> createArticle(@RequestBody ArticlePayload articlePayload, Principal principal)
      Creates a new article.
      Parameters:
      articlePayload - The payload containing article data.
      principal - The authenticated user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with ArticlePayload containing the created article.

    • updateArticle

      @PatchMapping("/update") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ArticlePayload> updateArticle(@RequestBody ArticlePayload articlePayload, Principal principal)
      Updates an existing article.
      Parameters:
      articlePayload - The payload containing updated article data.
      principal - The authenticated user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with ArticlePayload containing the updated article.

    • deleteArticle

      @DeleteMapping("/delete/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ArticlePayload> deleteArticle(@PathVariable Long id, Principal principal)
      Deletes an article by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the article to delete.
      principal - The authenticated user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with ArticlePayload containing the deleted article.
